bibl.title: Carrier Netting from the Ptolemaic Roman Harbour Town of Berenike (Egyptian Red Sea Coast).
bibl.note: Introduction. - The material [53 fragments, mostly from the first cent. AD]. - Use of carrier netting. - Discussion. - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: Antiguo Oriente. Cuadernos del Centro de Estudios de Historia del Antiguo Oriente

bibl.seg: André J. Veldmeijer & Sigrid M. van Roode, Carrier Netting from the Ptolemaic Roman Harbour Town of Berenike (Egyptian Red Sea Coast).
Antiguo Oriente. Cuadernos del Centro de Estudios de Historia del Antiguo Oriente 2 (2004) pp. 9-25, 1 tabl. et 8 figg.
Introduction. - The material [53 fragments, mostly from the first cent. AD]. - Use of carrier netting. - Discussion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
